text: Emma Caulfield (born Emma Chukker in San Diego, California on April 8, 1973) is an American actress. She is best known for her role as ex-demon Anya on the television series Buffy the Vampire Slayer. ==Selected filmography== *In her mother's footsteps (2006) (Television movie) *Bandwagon (2004) *I Want To Marry Ryan Banks (2004) *Darkness Falls (2003) *Buffy the Vampire Slayer (TV series) (1999–2003) *General Hospital (TV series) (1996–1997) == Other websites == * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:Actors from San Diego
title: Emma Caulfield
